programme.desc: With the theme of Heaven's Fugitive, Bang Jack has to deal with debt collectors who have minimal religious knowledge to teach them to become sharia-compliant debt collectors.

programme.title: Plis Genjreng Hatiku Dong Mas
programme.desc: Rika, a metal busker, has to disguise herself as her twin, the guitarist in a band. But Rika ends up falling for Athar, the band's vocalist. Rika has to maintain her disguise.

programme.title: MAKAN TEROOOS - EP 15
programme.desc: Explore culinary references that serve authentic flavors. Follow the culinary adventure of Indonesia only at Makan Terooos.

programme.title: THE SULTAN ENTERTAINMENT - EP 15
programme.desc: The Sultan is a talk show featuring two sultan-like hosts: Sultan Andara and Raffi Ahmad and Sultan Bintaro and Andre Taulany, accompanied by a cast of beautiful and handsome employees. It features spectacular guest stars and is definitely not to be missed. Find out more at The Sultan Entertainment.

programme.title: EXPLORIDE - EP 23
programme.desc: A Semi-Documentary about bicycle and cycling life

programme.title: GASPOL - EP 79
programme.desc: Gaspol, an SCTV game show hosted by Raffi Ahmad, is filled with prizes and tens of millions of rupiah in cash.

programme.title: Kami Tidak Bercerita, Tau Tau Naik Pelaminan Aja
programme.desc: Nadin is a hardworking and independent girl, she felt her life was fine before she met Azril. Nadin who works in a company, one time accidentally met with the annoying Azril. They got into an argument. Unintentionally when there was an event, they accidentally slept next to each other in the same place.

programme.title: Kalau Sudah Jodoh Pasti Ngebakso Juga
programme.desc: It tells the story of a beautiful girl named Ana. It is said that Ana is a meatball seller who uses a cart and hangs out in front of her grandfather Rendy's house. So gradually grandfather Rendy really likes Ana. Strangely, Rendy is annoyed because his grandfather is always looking for Ana. Even Rendy is curious, to the point of coming to Ana's cart and watching Ana mix meatballs for her customers. "Do you use pellets in the meatballs?" said Rendy in a hoarse voice.

programme.title: BARAYA URANG PASUNDAN - EP 16
programme.desc: Semi-documentary that explores a region of West Java lived by Sundanese

programme.title: MAD ABOUT - EP 17
programme.desc: A semi documentary magazine that show the world of hobbies and interest

programme.title: HOT SHOT - EP 502
programme.desc: Program infotainment yang membahas kehidupan selebriti secara mendalam.

programme.title: LIGA DANGDUT 2021 - EP 14
programme.desc: 70 Ambassadors from 34 Provinces compete for the Champion of the Largest Dangdut Competition in Indonesia. Best display, spectacular stage.

programme.title: Pasutri KW Udah Go Public
programme.desc: One day, Maira was shocked to find her father forcing her home to arrange an arranged marriage with Nathan. Maira only loved Gatra and refused to be separated. To save her family's reputation and her career, Surya asked Maira to marry Gatra.

programme.title: Mahkotamu Jatuh King Of Supir Taksi
programme.desc: Tells the story of the life of a beautiful girl named Lisa. It is said that Lisa always experiences bad luck in love. Starting from her boyfriend named Raka, who cheated on her with her own best friend. Until Lisa's life is turned upside down, until she becomes a car washer at a car wash. However, there is a taxi driver who has been accompanying Lisa. Until Lisa falls in love with him. Previously, Laras was the first passenger when Beni pulled a taxi. So Laras got a rose.

programme.title: LIGA DANGDUT 2021 - EP 14
programme.desc: 70 Ambassadors from 34 Provinces compete for the Champion of the Largest Dangdut Competition in Indonesia. Best display, spectacular stage.

programme.title: GASPOL - EP 79
programme.desc: Gaspol, an SCTV game show hosted by Raffi Ahmad, is filled with prizes and tens of millions of rupiah in cash.

programme.title: PARA PENCARI TUHAN 17 - EP 18
programme.desc: With the theme of Heaven's Fugitive, Bang Jack has to deal with debt collectors who have minimal religious knowledge to teach them to become sharia-compliant debt collectors.

programme.title: GOYANG CENDOL MANTAB JIWA
programme.desc: Salma and Kemal are involved in a dispute over commercial land. Salma, who has been selling es cendol for generations since her father's time, and Kemal, a doger ice cream seller who is actually the son of a wealthy man, compete using every means and trick they can think of to make their products sell well. It's not just about business, but also about finding a partner.

programme.title: CINTA SUCI - EP 16
programme.desc: Suci, who is entangled in problems, must marry Marcel because she desperately needs money for the medical expenses of her husband and children, Aditya and Ronny, so that they can both stay alive. On the other hand, Monica hates Suci because she thinks Suci forced Marcel to marry her.

programme.title: Belum Mantan Masih Demen
programme.desc: Maya (Shanice Margaretha) merasa ditinggalkan oleh Sigit (Kiki Farrel), laki-laki yang disukainya gara-gara Sigit sering mengunggah video bersama seorang gadis cantik. Maya pun bertekad untuk mengubah penampilan dan juga perilakunya demi bisa menggaet laki-laki tampan.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 470
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: CINTA AMARA - EP 144
programme.desc: An engineered tragedy left 6-month-old Aziza separated from her mother. However, the baby was rescued by her grandfather and taken as far away as possible, so that her granddaughter would have no further contact with the Nirwan family, the kayakers who own a famous bakery company. Burhan, the baby's grandfather entrusted his granddaughter to his confidant, whose wife was pregnant.

programme.title: GURIH CINTA KARI AYAM
programme.desc: Gilang raises chickens to prove something to his grandmother, but for him, that's not enough. Sita and Debi plan to make Gilang leave his farm so that he can take over his grandmother's business. Nesa is constantly pursued by Jaya, who wants her chicken curry business to join his catering company. Eventually, Nesa has to hide in Gilang's car. Nesa also drops Gilang's chickens, causing him to be caught.

programme.title: CINTA SUCI - EP 16
programme.desc: Suci, who is entangled in problems, must marry Marcel because she desperately needs money for the medical expenses of her husband and children, Aditya and Ronny, so that they can both stay alive. On the other hand, Monica hates Suci because she thinks Suci forced Marcel to marry her.

programme.title: Hot Tea Hot Tea Kalau Jatuh Hati
programme.desc: Zulfa and Kevin were forced to look for partners at a matchmaking agency, but they were betrayed by their respective partners. Because Zulfa and Kevin both needed partners for a mission, the matchmaking agency suggested that they work together. After being introduced to Zulfa's mother, it turned out that Kevin was the son of her friend. Zulfa's mother forced Kevin and Zulfa to get married immediately.

programme.title: Guruku Seleb - EP 9
programme.desc: Selebriti popular Indonesia akan dicabar untuk mengunjungi tempat-tempat terpencil di seluruh negara untuk mengajar pelajar sekolah yang kurang bernasib baik.

programme.title: Gado Gado 2 - EP 9
programme.desc: Siri komedi popular 90an, Gado Gado kini kembali dengan nafas baru dengan mengembalikan konsep komedi sketsa dan satira yang mempunyai pendekatan seperti slot television asli, iklan, telemovie, drama siri dan juga dokumentari.

programme.title: Bujang 40 - EP 13
programme.desc: Bujang, 40 tahun, sepanjang hidupnya sudah beberapa kali dia gagal bercinta. Kegagalan ini antara lain disebabkan sikap ibunya yang terlalu mengongkong hidupnya. Ini membuatkan Bujang mengambil keputusan untuk terus membujang

programme.title: Kiah The Spy - EP 13
programme.desc: Kiah membina kumpulan baru untuk menguruskan perniagaan Ikan Pekasamnya,dia juga dilatih dan dilantik menjadi seorang ejen rahsia.

programme.title: JOZAN - EP 11
programme.desc: Duo pelawak paling popular kini kembali setelah 7 tahun tidak bersama menghiburkan peminat menerusi program bual bicara terbaru yang pasti menghiburkan anda.

programme.title: Megat Extend - EP 14
programme.desc: Kisah komedi kehidupan di kampus sekumpulan pelajar yang tinggal bersama-sama di rumah milik senior mereka, Megat, pelajar senior yang 'in denial' dan tidak mahu untuk meninggalkan kehidupan kampus.

programme.title: Sepahtu - EP 4

programme.title: Klik Riders - EP 4
programme.desc: Sebuah program untun tontonan semua.

programme.title: Kalau Berani Kampung Stail - EP 4
programme.desc: Setiap minggu Sherry dan ketua kumpulan akan di bawa ke kampung yang berlainan bersama artis jemputan untuk menolong ketua kumpulan memenangi perlawanan mingguan

programme.title: Fan Fanatik - EP 9
programme.desc: Esah, Awa dan Noi, tiga dara pingitan yang berkawan baik meski berbeza personaliti. Mereka berhijrah ke Kuala Lumpur untuk bekerja dan secara tak sengaja bertemu Kak Lala, seorang tauke jamu terkenal

programme.title: Betul Ke Bohong? S5 - EP 2

programme.title: Isteri Halal - EP 38
programme.desc: Zayn masih cemburu buta terhadap Daniel dan Adellia. Adellia tetap dengan pendiriannya untuk meminta cerai daripada Zayn. Eyra rasa Zayn perlu lebih prihatin terhadap dirinya yang mengandung.

programme.title: Tetuan Ang & Rahimin - EP 15
programme.desc: Sebuah firma guaman hampir mengalami kerugian, apabila seorang ketua samseng mengupah mereka untuk melindungi operasi haramnya.

programme.title: RASA Ketuhar Kuali - EP 5
programme.desc: Majalah masakan di Malaysia kini di kaca televisyen anda memaparkan resepi - resepi menarik setiap minggu yang dihoskan oleh Norzaini Abdul Halim (Aunty Aini) bersama - sama Adam Mahamed Ismail.

programme.title: The House: Ezurin Khyra - EP 10
programme.desc: The House menampilkan Ezurin Khyra yang sering menjadi sorotan kerana imej glamornya. Program ini juga menayangkan keperibadian ibu kepada lima orang cahaya mata ini yang tidak diketahui umum.

programme.title: Dendam Cinta Arissa - EP 27
programme.desc: Perkahwinan Arissa & Zariman musnah apabila Rafeal melanggar Zariman dan melarikan diri untuk mengejar isterinya. Ingin jujur pada Arissa namun Rafeael jatuh cinta dengan Arissa tanpa sengaja.

programme.title: Cekelat Honey - EP 8
programme.desc: Prekuel kepada telemovie sebelumnya, mengisahkan bibit pertemuan antara Adam dan Maya. Adam jatuh cinta pada Maya namun harus bersaing dengan Rayyan Harris, seorang penyanyi yang juga menyukai Maya.

programme.title: Tai Tai Berkecai - EP 4
programme.desc: Azlan Martins dikenali sebagai lelaki yang paling dihormati di negara ini. The Martins Ladies, isterinya, dan dua anak perempuan terkenal dengan gaya hidup mewah mereka.

programme.title: Bulan & Pria Terhebat
programme.desc: Bulan, ejen khas dari Indonesia dalam misi mematahkan sindiket terbesar pemerdagangan manusia dan mencari adiknya yang diculik dengan mendapatkan pertolongan Haris dan kawan-kawannya.

programme.title: Catch and Cook - EP 4
programme.desc: Dalam Catch and Cook, Hairul Azreeen dan Theeban menyoroti lokasi indah di sekitar Malaysia dengan satu misi, iaitu untuk menangkap ikan di tempat itu dan memasaknya dengan bantuan tetamu chef selebriti.

programme.title: Travel Like Local x Aussie - EP 6
programme.desc: Setiap minggu dua selebriti akan menerokai tempat-tempat menarik dan unik di sekitar Australia.

programme.title: Hala 3 - EP 11
programme.desc: Mengembara ke tempat-tempat menarik di Malaysia bersama Remy Ishak dengan menaiki motosikalnya.

programme.title: Strawberi Karipap The Series - EP 13
programme.desc: Nini dan Haikal iaitu adik beradik tiri menjadi bosan apabila asyik bertukar rumah, justeru mereka merancang untuk menyatukan Hairi dan Lisa iaitu penjaga sementara mereka.

programme.title: Impiana - EP 13
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan yang berkonsepkan tentang "make over" bahagian di dalam rumah bagi memenuhi citarasa pemilik rumah.

programme.title: Kembara Chef Wan S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: Datuk Chef Wan akan meroka Kota Istanbul iaitu Sultanahmet, Beyoglu, dan Taksim. Kesemuanya dikelilingi oleh restoran, makanan jalanan dan seni bina hebat.

programme.desc: Shakuntala and King Dushyant marry, but Dushyant forgets all about Shakuntala due to a sage's curse.

programme.title: Echappees Belles - EP 6
programme.desc: Sophie Jovillard, Jerome Pitorin, Ismael Khelifa and Tiga embark the traveller that lies within each of us for a fabulous breath of fresh air! Ninety minutes filled with new horizons and fascinating encounters around the world, four different ways of seeing a city, a region, a country...

programme.title: Tendance XXI - EP 24
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Lebowitz Contre Lebowitz - EP 3
programme.desc: Accused by several women of infecting them with HIV, Nicolas asks the law firm to defend him. Meanwhile, Paule is horrified to discover that Irene has handed over the care of her son to Simon's mother. Particularly as the latter's confused state means she mistakes him for her own son.

programme.title: Lebowitz Contre Lebowitz - EP 4
programme.desc: Paule becomes Simon's surrogate mother. Warnier profits from the situation to tell his dying mother that he intends to marry Paule and adopt Simon. Meanwhile, Paule takes on the defence of a young police officer accused of committing a tragic error during a raid in an inner-city housing estate.

programme.title: Carbone - EP 6
programme.desc: We wondered whether a good mix of sustainable transport systems is really possible, outside the major towns, and whether it would be enough to persuade us to abandon the car.

programme.title: 64' - 2e Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: Temps Present
programme.desc: 'Temps Present'' tackles current events broadly speaking. With its in-depth investigations and critical vision, the programme sheds light on the crises and the conflicts of our time, while denouncing the malfunctions of our society.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Rassemblance - EP 16
programme.desc: Florentina was 14 years old when the dictator Ceausescu was assassinated. She then discovered new words such as freedom and democracy. Twenty years later, she left for the 'other side of the iron curtain', France, where she has found a land of possibility.

programme.title: C'est Du Belge
programme.desc: Gerald Watelet shines the spotlight on the people putting Belgium on the map. Expect reports on the best culture and heritage ambassadors, behind-the-scenes glimpses of elite events and profiles of those making headlines.

programme.desc: All the African news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: L'actu

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: C Dans L'air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Histoire(S) De Jardins - EP 10
programme.desc: In the village of Windisch, lying in the canton of Argovie and famous for its gardens, Susanne Looser's mother had created an English cottage garden. On her death, Susanne took over and, whilst adapting it to embrace her own personality, she continues to keep her mother's garden very much alive.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1689
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Une Brique Dans Le Ventre
programme.desc: In addition to the houses, apartments and lofts of various styles and prices which Cedric Wautier shows us through his many visits, this programme about homes offers legal, practical, technical, energy and aesthetic advice, without forgetting the part about the all-important DIY ''tricks''.

programme.title: Le Gout Des Rencontres En Nouvelle-Aquitaine - EP 38
programme.desc: Exploring rural land and culinary traditions! Chef Justine Piluso criss-crosses Nouvelle-Aquitaine to meet men and women in the region to learn about their products, their tastes and the dishes that they prepare.

programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Une Brique Dans Le Ventre
programme.desc: In addition to the houses, apartments and lofts of various styles and prices which Cedric Wautier shows us through his many visits, this programme about homes offers legal, practical, technical, energy and aesthetic advice, without forgetting the part about the all-important DIY ''tricks''.

programme.title: Histoire(S) De Jardins - EP 10
programme.desc: In the village of Windisch, lying in the canton of Argovie and famous for its gardens, Susanne Looser's mother had created an English cottage garden. On her death, Susanne took over and, whilst adapting it to embrace her own personality, she continues to keep her mother's garden very much alive.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 60
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 4
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Yetili - EP 17
programme.desc: Nina and Leon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yetili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yetili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Dessine Les Animaux Avec Koumi - EP 34
programme.desc: Koumi is 6 years old, mischievous and always full of fun. The dream of her life is to know all the animals of the world, and she absolutely loves drawing! In each episode she explains how to draw animals really well.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 7
programme.desc: Pokou escapes the the priestesses' camp under the unblinking gaze of the Komians. She meets N'zi and together they run towards the forest and find themselves back in the camp again.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 8
programme.desc: Aza Yah demands her stick and her cowrie shells from Kongouet Bian. She wants to destroy him, but he manages to persuade her not to harm him.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Itineraires Paysans - EP 7
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1690
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Enquetes De Region - EP 5
programme.desc: Travels to discover the regions of France. Through these territories, the investigations come as close as possible to the issues of today's society.

programme.title: Le Journal International
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Le Monde D'hier
programme.desc: Three days before the first round of the presidential election, elizabeth de Raincy, President of the Republic, wants to retire from politics. But Franck L'Herbier, Secretary General of the elysee Palace, tells her that a foreign scandal from is likely to hand victory to the far-right candidate.

programme.title: Avant-Garde
programme.desc: 1984, the French-German border. A gallery owner from Berlin is carrying with him a flagship sculpture of his collection to present it in a major exhibition. But on seeing the object, the French customs officer is hesitant: is it really an artwork?

programme.title: 2 Ou 3 Choses Que Je Ne Sais Pas D'elle
programme.desc: At 18, Lila has decided to wear the Muslim headscarf, much to the dismay of her family who have gathered to celebrate Eid. But, after an argument with her boyfriend she is in a resolutely bad mood and decides to slip away.

programme.title: Fred L'handicape - EP 1
programme.desc: Fred ends up paralysed after breaking two vertebrae in an accident. How will his relationship with Myriam change following the tragedy and all its challenges?

programme.title: Fred L'handicape - EP 2
programme.desc: Life in hospital is starting to get him down. Fred relies heavily on friends and family, and his medical team. But when life is at its darkest, a new arrival in his life offers a glimmer of hope.

programme.title: Fred L'handicape - EP 3
programme.desc: Fred is perfectly aware that he'll have to live with his disability for the rest of his life. Will he have the courage to get back up on the improvisation stage?

programme.title: Fred L'handicape - EP 4
programme.desc: A ''making of'' takes us behind the scenes with the series' actors, author and director.

programme.title: Ethique Helvetique
programme.desc: What shaped Swiss thought? By analysing the history of the country, Tristan Miquel and Julien Girardin question the ethical and philosophical challenges facing their society and draw up parallels between the past and the present to stimulate reflection on different schools of thought.

programme.title: Le Vieux Fusil
programme.desc: 1944. Julien Dandieu, a surgeon from Montauban, decides to send his wife and daughter to the country and greater safety. A few days later he discovers that the entire population of the village has been massacred by the Germans. Mad with grief, he sets out to hunt down those responsible.

programme.title: Papillon
programme.desc: A man swims in the sea. As he advances, memories come flooding back. From early childhood to his adult life, all his memories are connected to water. Some are happy, others glorious or even traumatic...

programme.title: Les Fleurs Sauvages
programme.desc: Over a phone message, a man explains how to use his tractor so that the person on the other end can mow the lawn in his garden in his absence.

programme.title: Movie - Natpe Thunai
programme.desc: Prabhakaran, a former hockey player, helps a local team save their ground by training them to win a match against the Pondicherry team. However, a corrupt politician has his eyes set on the ground.

programme.title: Movie - Ennuyir Kannamma
programme.desc: En Uyir Kannamma is a 1988 Indian Tamil language film that marked the directorial debut of Sivachandran. The film stars Prabhu, Radha, Lakshmi and S. S. Chandran. The film had musical score by Ilaiyaraaja.

programme.title: Movie - Sakthi
programme.desc: After Sakthi foils Sethupati's attempt to steal the temple idols and jewels, he begins to guard the temple himself. He also learns that Sita, a woman ostracised by the village, is actually his mother.

programme.title: Movie - Pudhu Kudithanam
programme.desc: Ashok is a very obedient son, and his mother would like an equally submissive daughter-in-law so that she does not influence him. But Ashok secretly marries Nila, who actually dislikes this situation.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Azhahi
programme.desc: A veterinarian recalls his childhood days when he fell in love with a girl who studied with him at school.

programme.title: Movie - Nattupura Nayagan
programme.desc: London-educated Ranjani falls in love with Allimuthu, a local dancer. Her brother, however, is against the alliance. Further, on a cultural tour in Delhi, Allimuthu falls in love with a foreigner.

programme.title: Movie - Raja Kaiya Vecha
programme.desc: Raja pretends to be a cop in order to impress the woman he loves, and she dumps him on learning the truth. When they meet again, he has a good job, but there is someone else who is in love with him.

programme.title: Movie - Ezhaiyin Sirippil
programme.desc: Ganesan is a bus driver. Kousalya, the daughter of his boss, slowly falls for him. But she is shocked when she sees him being accused by a mentally ill woman who holds him responsible for her state.

programme.title: Movie - Muthukku Muthaga
programme.desc: A couple raises their five kids despite their insufficient income. They love their kids, and the love is well reciprocated. They guide their children through the path of their lives, but things change when they get older.

programme.title: Movie - Kalavaram
programme.desc: A policeman acts as a vigilante and recruits a large number of students to help him.

programme.title: Movie - Mattuthavani
programme.desc: Despite the disapproval of her elite friends, Maheshwari marries Ram, a poor student. Their married life runs into trouble when her friends speak poorly about Ram.

programme.title: Movie - Idhu Enga Boomi
programme.desc: Vijay lands in jail while avenging his sister's death. However, when he escapes prison and starts working at Nagalingam's home, he learns that he is planning to steal the villagers' money.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Anbe Sivam
programme.desc: When Nalla and Aras get stranded at the airport, Aras tries to keep away from the man with a deformity. However, while forcefully accompanying each other to Chennai, they form an unexpected bond.

programme.title: Movie - Veadha
programme.desc: Two brothers are in love with the same girl. The elder brother, who the girl is in love with, convinces her to marry his brother. But on the day of the wedding, a shocking truth comes out and it changes their lives from there on.

programme.title: Movie - Vambu Chanda
programme.desc: A rich boy learns that his real father is someone else, alive and in a mental asylum. He puts him under the care of an Ayurveda specialist and soon discovers the culprits behind his father's plight.

programme.title: Movie - Chocolate

programme.desc: Bharani, who lives with his uncle Saravanan, loves Bhanu but cannot marry her as her family and his uncle share an unpleasant history. To win his love, he tries everything to unite the two families.

programme.title: Classic Match
programme.desc: We delve into the Premier League archive to bring you a Classic Match from the 2012/2013 season.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 25
programme.desc: Ahead of the first North London derby of the season, we sit down with the man who made one of most controversial transfers in World football; Sol Campbell. He opens up about his decision to leave Tottenham for their fiercest rivals, Arsenal, the intense pressure of returning to White Hart Lane that first season, and how he's dealt with the fallout ever since. A fascinating insight into the 'move that shook North London'.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 18
programme.desc: Widely regarded as one of the best teams in Premier League history, we speak to the players who formed part of the Arsenal Invincibles of the 2003-04 season and hear about the behind the scenes stories and funny anecdotes from that unforgettable league win. With contributions from Thierry Henry, Patrick Vieira, Dennis Bergkamp, Freddie Ljungberg, Ray Parlour and Martin Keown.

programme.title: PL MOMENTS - EP 2
programme.desc: Premier League Moments sits down with one of the most dominant centre-backs the league has ever seen. Sol Campbell rose through the ranks at Tottenham Hotspur before making one of the most controversial moves in Premier League history, when he crossed the divide to join rivals Arsenal. Under Arsene Wenger, Campbell became a cornerstone of the defence, winning two league titles and playing a vital role in the Invincibles season.

programme.title: THE CATCH-UP SHOW - EP 14
programme.desc: We look back at all the very best moments of the 2025/2026 season so far. An action-packed show filled with exciting Premier League programming and digital content.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 14
programme.desc: From his family fish stall in the markets of Cuiaba, Brazil to the Premier League - still just 24 years old, Igor Jesus' footballing journey has already taken him to three continents. In this week's Big Interview, we catch up with the Cuiaba native on the banks of Hawton Waters in Nottinghamshire to discuss his youth and rise through the ranks in Brazil, his move to Saudi Arabia before returning to Brazil to lift the Copa Libertadores and now, life in the Premier League with Nottingham Forest.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 24
programme.desc: We head to London to unveil the two newest inductee's into the Premier League Hall of fame. Hosted by Kelly Cates, and with a who's who of footballing royalty in attendance, we go behind the curtain to give you exclusive access to the hottest ticket in town.

programme.title: PL MOMENTS - EP 14
programme.desc: Arsenal legend and Invincible, Robert Pires looks back on his greatest Premier League moments, counting down his top 10 from his unforgettable career in England. From stunning goals to title-winning performances, Pires reflects on the moments that defined his time in the league, sharing personal insights and behind the scenes stories along the way.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 25
programme.desc: Ahead of the first North London derby of the season, we sit down with the man who made one of most controversial transfers in World football; Sol Campbell. He opens up about his decision to leave Tottenham for their fiercest rivals, Arsenal, the intense pressure of returning to White Hart Lane that first season, and how he's dealt with the fallout ever since. A fascinating insight into the 'move that shook North London'.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 21
programme.desc: We follow the rise of one of Italy's most gifted midfielders and his journey to Premier League stardom at Newcastle United, Sandro Tonali. From his early days at Brescia, where his talent drew comparisons to Italian greats, to his development at AC Milan and eventual move to St. James' Park, we trace Tonali's evolution on and off the pitch.

programme.desc: We delve into the Premier League archive to bring you a Classic Match from the 2018/2019 season.

programme.desc: We look back at all the very best moments of the 2025/2026 season so far. An action-packed show filled with exciting Premier League programming and digital content.

programme.title: REVIEW OF THE SEASON - 2024/2025 (LIV)
programme.desc: Relive another extraordinary Premier League campaign as Liverpool soared to an historic 20th league title, Nottingham Forest defied expectations and the promoted sides were strenuously challenged. There were also tactical transformations, shifts in narrative trends, and a more open field than ever before. Review of the Season documents all of the thrilling stories to emerge across the 380 matches.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 4
programme.desc: After just one year of top flight football, Micky van de Ven signed for Tottenham Hotspur - quickly establishing himself as a key figure in Spurs' Europa League winning side, his iconic clearance playing a crucial part in securing the club a first major trophy for 17 years. In this week's Big Interview, we discuss his rise from the Dutch second division, to the Bundesliga with Wolfsburg before making the move to the Premier League.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 1
programme.desc: One of only two managers to have been inducted into the Premier League Hall of fame, Arsene Wenger lifted three Premier League trophies and was in charge of Arsenal when they went a whole season in the top flight unbeaten. programme.title: FANZONE - FRI 21 NOV (Live)
programme.desc: This is the show that puts international fans at the heart of the Premier League conversation. We connect with fans from around the world as they share their views on their teams and favourite players.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Tshilumba Mikixi vs. August Kayambala
programme.desc: In this episode Tshilomba 'The Old Monkey' Mikixi takes on August 'The Barista' Kayambala in a lightweight clash.

programme.title: WCCB Ben Whittaker vs. Liam Cameron II
programme.desc: From Resorts World Arena in Birmingham, one of the top prospects in boxing, Olympic Silver Medalist Ben Whittaker, meets Liam Cameron in a highly anticipated light heavyweight rematch of their dramatic split draw last November. In their first meeting on the undercard of Beterbiev/Bivol from Saudi Arabia, Whittaker was unable to finish the bout when both fighters fell from the ring.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best of the Hohhot Grand Prix, and stop to get to know the world's #1 ranked fighter Aleksandar Kukolj. We then head to Russia to witness the effect that Judo has on the Russian people.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Amir Khan vs. Danny Garcia
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a light welterweight title unification bout between Amir Khan and Danny Garcia. Also on the card, former heavyweight champ James Kirkland.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4 featuring Takarafuji, Yoshikaze, Takakeisho and Daishomaru from the Natsu basho, 2018.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 8: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and the Martial Art of Grappling with Masters Renato Barreto and Breno Sivak.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Sergio Martinez vs. Paul Williams I
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features middleweights Sergio 'Maravilla' Martinez (44-1, 24 KOs) vs. Paul 'The Punisher' Williams (37-1, 27 KOs) from Boardwalk Hall in Atlantic City, New Jersey, USA, on December 5, 2009. The result was a controversial majority decision, and the two would eventually square off in a rematch about a year later.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: The second group of competitors race each other and the clock to complete Stage 1. In addition to old nemeses like the Giant Ring and Jumping Spider, contestants will face new obstacles: Piston Road and the Silk Slider.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Andre Berto vs. David Estrada

programme.title: Money Movers - EP 1
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions.

programme.title: Money Movers - EP 2
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions.

programme.title: Halftime Report - EP 1
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Halftime Report - EP 2
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC’s ‘The Exchange’ is the newsroom-based program for today’s investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 2
programme.desc: CNBC’s ‘The Exchange’ is the newsroom-based program for today’s investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Power Lunch - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Power Lunch - EP 2
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Closing Bell - EP 1
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Closing Bell - EP 2
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime - EP 1
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime - EP 2
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. programme.title: Fast Money - EP 1
programme.desc: "Fast Money" is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: Inside India - EP 1

programme.title: Access Middle East - EP 1
programme.desc: Access Middle East is your window into Middle East power, money, and influence. With exclusive interviews and high-level analysis, the program brings viewers closer to the decision-makers deploying capital and driving innovation in one of the world’s most dynamic regions.

programme.title: U.S. Markets Edition - EP 131
programme.desc: U.S. Markets Edition delivers key takeaways from the most impactful interviews and insights from CNBC’s programming in the US. As global markets become more interconnected, this program ensures audiences in Asia stay informed on major developments shaping the business world overnight.

programme.title: Europe Early Edition - EP 1
programme.desc: Start your trading day with Europe Early Edition as European financial centres take the reins of global markets. With breaking news, key earnings and data, as well as interviews with market makers and C-Suite executives from across the globe, Europe Early Edition is essential viewing to be prepared for the day’s session.

programme.title: Squawk Box Europe - EP 1
programme.desc: It’s one hour until the opening bell in Europe and Squawk Box Europe has everything you need to prepare for the first trade. programme.title: Worldwide Exchange - EP 1
programme.desc: Broadcast from CNBC Global Headquarters in Englewood Cliffs, N.J., CNBC’s "Worldwide Exchange" delivers essential, actionable information and analysis for anyone who wants to be part of the global business conversation. Anchored by Frank Holland, the program prepares CNBC’s worldwide audience with a smart take on overnight U.S. news and live international market action.

programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: China 24
programme.desc: China 24 is a prime time news program featuring in-depth reports and analysis of the stories in the headlines in China. Produced by CGTN’s studios in Beijing and Washington D.C., the show takes a compelling and comprehensive look at China. It explores the country’s business, politics, technology, culture, entertainment and more. China 24 tackles head-on the issues that matter most to the nation and its people, with topical reports highlighting challenges facing this fast-changing country.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: The Point with Liu Xin
programme.desc: The Point with LIU Xin is a current affairs program on CGTN. The program comments on global news through LIU Xin’s very own unique perspective. programme.title: Night Serial Drama "Hirayasumi" Eps. 12
programme.desc: A warm and bittersweet drama based on the internationally beloved manga by Shinzo Keigo. Ikuta Hiroto (Okayama Amane), 29, has no job, no romantic partner, and none of the usual worries about the future. Drawn to his easygoing personality, a local elderly woman gives him a single-story house. He begins living with his 18-year-old cousin Natsumi (Mori Nana), who has just moved to Tokyo from Yamagata. Before long, people carrying quiet burdens begin to gather around him.

programme.title: Made In Taiwan

programme.title: The Exorcist's Meter - EP 4
programme.desc: A taxi driver unwittingly releases the curse of a 100-year-old spirit and begins to battle demons.

programme.title: TVB 58th Anniversary Gala
programme.desc: Join TVB in celebrating its anniversary, a grand event held each year on 19 November.

programme.title: Modern Dynasty - EP 30
programme.desc: Zhen Xin and Jia Luoyi marry into the wealthy Ma family on the same day. The 'wedding of the century' paves the way for the ups and down among the three generations in the Ma family.

programme.title: Big City Shop 2024
programme.desc: Big City Shop introduces viewers to the latest products on fashion, skin care, make-up, health care, baby care and much more! The hosts will demonstrate and try on the products, and also invite related experts to share their knowledge.

programme.title: Happy Old Buddies
programme.desc: This show brings on doctors and Chinese medicine practitioners to discuss diseases that the elderly should pay attention to, and provide prevention and treatment methods.

programme.title: Made In Dongguan
programme.desc: Wong Cho-lam, a Dongguan native, leads the way on this journey to find the most authentic Dongguan delicacies!

programme.title: The Exorcist's Meter - EP 5

programme.title: A Race Against Time
programme.desc: Hong Kong International Airport is an important hub for global air cargo. Our hosts visit the origins of different goods such as Belgium and Japan. Tracking the cargo process, they learn about the important role played by Hong Kong International Airport and the air cargo terminal.

programme.title: Listen To Your Body
programme.desc: Each episode of this show focuses on a specific health area, exploring how abnormal conditions in different organs can indicate potential problems. It will also provide new information on diet, exercise, research and medical treatment for various health issues.

programme.title: Overnighters & What's On Today
programme.desc: Discover unique ways to travel in Vietnam, Japan and mainland China, using buses, boats and trains to experience fast transportation and exploring attractions at each destination.

programme.title: Mystery Files
programme.desc: This live show invites various personalities, celebrity guests and experts to explore relationship challenges with unique perspectives and provocative questions, tailored to each episode's theme. Viewers join in the conversation through live chat rooms and voice calls.

programme.desc: A game show focused on common household problems and trivia, contestants participate in challenges and answer questions related to daily home life. Through humour and friendly competition, the programme aims to offer practical solutions and tips for better living at home.

programme.title: Clash Of Home Chefs
programme.desc: Home-cooked meals may seem ordinary, but they're also economical, enjoyable and delicious, thanks to the skill of one's cooking. Fourteen contestants present their own unique recipes, which are then reviewed by our hosts, judges and celebrity guests!

programme.title: Overnighters
programme.desc: Discover unique ways to travel in Vietnam, Japan and mainland China, using buses, boats and trains to experience fast transportation and exploring attractions at each destination.

programme.title: Court Lady - EP 1
programme.desc: Sheng Chumu, son of General Sheng Xiaojing, falls in love with Fu Rou, the daughter of an embroidery merchant. Having confirmed their feelings, the two return to Chang'an. Fu Rou soon becomes a female official, and Sheng Chumu is forced to join the army.

programme.title: News At 18:30

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2687
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: The QUEEN Of News 2 - EP 8
programme.desc: The story tells of anchorwoman Wen Huixin, who leaves SNK News Station and enters into a new competitive news industry landscape, forming a rivalry with Gu Zhaohua and Zhang Jiayan.

programme.desc: The drama is adapted from Shui He's novel "Under The Moonlight ". The two work together to solve cases.

programme.title: The Litchi Road - EP 30
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Adapted from the same-name novel, the drama features a minor official, Li Shande (Lei Jia Yin), during the Tang Dynasty. He overcomes numerous hardships and travels thousands of miles to deliver lychees from Gaozhou in Lingnan to Chang’an.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2085
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 12
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Auyeung Kwan interferes with Chow Chun-kit investigating Au Ming-wai. Chow Chun-kit is inspired by Ho Tin-yu, so he starts investigating with some witness introduced by Au Ming-wai, whose alibi is overturned. The duo are arrested. During the investigation, Chow Chun-kit believes he and Bong are monitored by the mole, and it’s something involved in the conspiracy of the entire police force.

programme.title: The Wanted Detective - EP 19
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] On his wedding day, Xiao Bei Ming (Wang Xing Yue), the best detective of Qi, was framed as a demon and fled into the lake on the charge of murdering his master and treason. Three years later, he returned and joins a group of witty partners to seek justice.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2085
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne (with Eng Subs) - EP 17
programme.desc: Chi-bun is worried about Chi-lam exposing the family scandal. He lectures Chi-lam, who is annoyed. Chi-lam tells him they are not Sau-yi’s children. To declare he is the only successor, Chi-bun brings forward the Hon-yeung bronze statue unveiling ceremony. But he has not informed Ho-yee. Chi-lam unwittingly finds out Ko Sing was the youth club badminton team captain.

programme.desc: Chi-bun cannot locate Chi-lam, who is found drowned. The Yaus and the Kos are really upset. And Inspector Lau investigates and questions the chums. Permission for change of land use is granted to Diamond Plaza. Sau-yi and Ho-yee have different opinions about the development project. Ko Tsun uses Chi-bun’s true background to coerce him into convincing Sau-yi to collaborate with Ho-yee.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 758
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: The Escape of the Seven - EP 11
programme.desc: A girl disappears from the world due to the Bobble Incident, and seven wicked people are involved in the incident. Who will be able to survive this bloody revenge?

programme.title: The Litchi Road - EP 31
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Adapted from the same-name novel, the drama features a minor official, Li Shande (Lei Jia Yin), during the Tang Dynasty. He overcomes numerous hardships and travels thousands of miles to deliver lychees from Gaozhou in Lingnan to Chang’an.

programme.title: Sinister Beings 2 - EP 21
programme.desc: Shing-mo suspects his identity is exposed. He slyly verifies and finds the truth. Chun-sum finds out Shing-mo’s boss has brought a contingent of hitmen to Hong Kong. He is worried about Cheung Hei getting involved. On the day of carrying out the deal, the situation radically changes. While getting ready to quit, Shing-mo is pursued by the organization’s assassins.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 759
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2086
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: The Litchi Road - EP 32
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Adapted from the same-name novel, the drama features a minor official, Li Shande (Lei Jia Yin), during the Tang Dynasty. He overcomes numerous hardships and travels thousands of miles to deliver lychees from Gaozhou in Lingnan to Chang’an.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 14
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] While serving her sentence, Lee Nga-man found out her mother died from neglect due to Kin Fung Group. She is determined to get even with Kung Yau-shing and Tai Cho-fuk. Lau Yu-fan does not know anything about this matter. He is remorseful about not being able to punish Kung Yau-shing himself.

programme.title: The Wanted Detective - EP 21
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] On his wedding day, Xiao Bei Ming (Wang Xing Yue), the best detective of Qi, was framed as a demon and fled into the lake on the charge of murdering his master and treason. Three years later, he returned and joins a group of witty partners to seek justice.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2087
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne (with Eng Subs) - EP 19
programme.desc: Some security guard at Ko Tsun’s apartment block mentions he saw Chi-lam arguing with Ho-yee that day when Chi-lam got into trouble. Chi-bun tells Sau-yi and his chums about this matter. Ho-yee is reprimanded. Lai-kei finds out the issues between her father and Sau-yi all those years ago. She is determined to seek justice for her parents.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 759
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour - EP 3
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a ‘Fire master’ in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHING’s third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager.

programme.title: Just Love - EP 12
programme.desc: Judge KO HEI MAN (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER) and KOT KWOK KWONG (CHAN KAM HUNG, SUNNY) have agreed that MAN will concentrate on her career while KWONG will be taking care of the housework after they get married. Everything is in harmony until KWONG’s father discovers MAN and KWONG’s pre-marriage written agreement. Their relationship complicates ever since._x000D__x000D_ To make things worse, KWONG breaks the agreement and demands to have his own career.

programme.title: Get On A Flat - EP 8
programme.desc: Rewind to the 2008 financial crisis and supermarket manager Che Chi-ming (Andrew Lam) hurriedly sells his apartment. Who could have known even though Chi-ming has been chasing after property prices for 14 years, he still cannot get on the property ladder once again. A middle class lifestyle is tragically transformed into a "midlife crisis"._x000D__x000D_Chi-ming’s wife Man Wai (Elena Kong) is obsessed with property ownership. She goes to work as a part-time maid at some luxury home.

programme.title: Fist Within Four Walls, A - EP 17
programme.desc: CHOR AU-KUEN (Ruco Chan) bears the grief of the loss of his family and returns to the walled city in hopes of finding his long lost sister, only to find out that the place he grew up in has become a lawless no man's land. Concealing his real identity as a Bajiquan master, he creates a new identity and gets acquainted with a feisty hair salon lady boss, TIU LAN (Nancy Wu), a dentist, DUEN YING-FUNG (Benjamin Yuen), and a worker, BUT TAK-LIU (Lam Tsz Sin).

programme.title: Silver Spoon, Sterling Shackles - EP 24
programme.desc: During the 1930s in Hong Kong, where east meets west, feminist activists started campaigning for women's rights, seeking to uproot the phenomenon of men's superiority over women. Though having studied abroad in England and leading a western lifestyle, CHUNG CHEUK-MAN (Damian Lau) , a well-known Chinese barrister, is very traditional indeed.

programme.title: Silver Spoon, Sterling Shackles - EP 25
