programme.title: Silver Spoon, Sterling Shackles - EP 29
programme.desc: During the 1930s in Hong Kong, where east meets west, feminist activists started campaigning for women's rights, seeking to uproot the phenomenon of men's superiority over women. Though having studied abroad in England and leading a western lifestyle, CHUNG CHEUK-MAN (Damian Lau) , a well-known Chinese barrister, is very traditional indeed.

programme.title: Golden Chicken
programme.desc: Ah Kam, a seasoned prostitute, gets locked inside an ATM vestibule with a thief. Both discover they are ill-fated in life and Ah Kam starts telling him her life story as a prostitute, from a teenage hooker to a PR girl in an upscale club in her thirties, as well as being a strip dancer, bar girl and masseuse.

programme.title: Hong Kong Playboys
programme.desc: Sheng is a rich playboy who lives a carefree and fun life with the ladies, until his mother decides that he should get married. Up against other lady killers in his quest to find Miss Right, Sheng must decide what he wants.

programme.title: Love For All Seasons
programme.desc: May, acting leader of the Er Mei sect, cures the incurable illness of Tiger, a rich playboy. Under the threat of her senior, May seeks help from Tiger to experience heartbreak and master the "Heartbroken Sword" style, so as to defeat her senior and preserve Er Mei sect. Will this strange and long-winding relationship reach a happy ending?

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair II
programme.desc: After being betrayed by Zhuo, the white-haired witch Lian seeks revenge by slaughtering her way through the eight martial arts clans. However, she is soon attacked by a man whose bride she has abducted. Meanwhile, Zhuo, who is waiting on a hilltop for a flower to bloom for Lian's restoration, hastens to save her upon realizing the danger she is in.

programme.title: How to Choose a Royal Bride
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager has arranged for a Minister's daughter Qiong Yao, to become Emperor Kangxi's concubine. However, Qiong Yao escapes in pursuit of freedom in marriage and Kangxi is happy to not go through with the union. When Kangxi travels incognito to Jiangnan, he serendipitously encounters Qiong Yao, who disguises herself as a man...

programme.title: Women
programme.desc: Bo Yi's husband is having an affair, so Bo Yi divorces him and joins the "Happy Spinsters Club" set up by her friends. However, she soon finds out that she does not enjoy being single and while sorting out her thoughts, her repentant husband begs her forgiveness. She must now decide on what she truly wants.

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: Mr. Virgin
programme.desc: Mr. Virgin is a romantic comedy about a twenty-nine year-old man Chao Yu-ting (Alfred Chang) who has seemingly been cursed. He becomes paranoid when a Feng Shui expert tells him it will be unlucky for him to marry before the age of thirty... so comical chaos line the days up to his next birthday!

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair
programme.desc: As Wudang disciple Zhuo Yi Hang confronts the Demon Palace, he reunites with Lian Ni Shang, the woman who once saved him, and their love reignites. Lian, a disciple of the Demon Palace, endures torment to be with Zhuo but is shattered when he accidentally injures her. A fierce battle between good and evil unfolds!

programme.title: Cherie
programme.desc: Cherie Chung plays the title character in this sexy romance as a fitness instructor who attracts the attentions of a wealthy businessman and a handsome photographer.

programme.title: Out of the Dark
programme.desc: An old lady died after mysteriously falling off a building and her ghost appears to haunt the place. This freaked out the security guards, who invite ghostbuster Leo and his female assistant to help. In the process, Leo finds out that the old lady was killed by her son and daughter in law. To rest her soul, Leo promises to bring the couple to justice.

programme.title: My School Mate, The Barbarian
programme.desc: Edward attends a new school which has a reputation for fighting. Student leader Stone, befriends Edward, but their friendship is tested when a local triad leader discovers that Edward comes from a wealthy family.

programme.title: City of Desire
programme.desc: Sister 13 returns to Macau after 17 years to succeed her father's underground empire, the prostitution business. She tries to stop their exploitation of the sex workers, but Macau's economy flourished after the handover, propelling the prostitution and gambling businesses. The city is blinded by desire and Sister 13 can do nothing to help...

programme.title: Casino Tycoon II
programme.desc: This is a sequel to "Casino Tycoon". 20 years after Benny Ho established his casino empire in Macau, his former partner becomes envious and plots to bring him down. At the same time, a young man working for Benny is the son of his ex-lover, and is also out to take revenge on him. Ho however, is not about to take things lying down...

programme.title: The Medallion
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Eddie is hired by the Interpol to capture a human smuggling gang leader known as Snakehead. Eddie dies in an action to protect a sacred child from being kidnapped, but is brought back to life by the child's magical medallion, allowing him to finally kill Snakehead.

programme.title: The Myth
programme.desc: An archaeologist Jack, and a scientist William, stumble upon ancient Qin Dynasty artifacts that lead them to the mausoleum and mysteriously connects Jack to his past life as a warrior in ancient China, starting their mythical journey.

programme.title: The Flying Mr. B
programme.desc: Mr. Shi, a secondary PE teacher, accidentally takes a "super pill" invented by the science teacher and gains superpower, turning into Mr. B. He uses his superpower to help the school sports team win the championship and prevent crimes. When the triad is made aware of Mr. B's superpower, they try to gain the super pill for nefarious purposes.

programme.title: Royal Tramp
programme.desc: Wei Xiao Bao is sent by a revolutionary group to be a spy in the imperial palace and find "The Sutra of 42 Chapters". Xiao Bao soon befriends Emperor Kang Xi but must carry out his mission at the same time, so he is caught between two camps.

programme.title: Lifeline
programme.desc: A heroic tale about Hong Kong's brave firefighters. These courageous men can march into disastrous firegrounds and risk their lives to save others. However, do they have the same courage to confront their personal issues?

programme.title: Wise Guys Never Die
programme.desc: Nick meets Teddy, a con artiste, when he is sent to prison for embezzlement, and Teddy teaches him all the gambling tricks. After their release, they team up with Teddy's lover Lora, to take revenge on Dragon, who framed Teddy for his sentence. Nick though is seduced by Lora and they end up in an affair. Will Nick finally join Teddy in his revenge?

programme.title: Prince Charming
programme.desc: Chen Li Pin, the nerdy son of a business tycoon, and his friend seek love in Hawaii. Returning home in disappointment, they accidentally find themselves in a messy identity swap. It is at this time that Chen falls for a beautiful girl May, who thinks he is a company chauffeur...

programme.title: Ninth Happiness
programme.desc: A comedy starring many popular movie stars, this is a story about a magistrate and his brothers aiming to introduce sin and romance into the virtuous community of Rainbow Village. As they vie for the affections of a charming young village maiden, conflicts arise, adding a twist to their mischievous endeavours.

programme.title: Painted Faces
programme.desc: This is based on the real-life story of Master Yu Jim Yuen who strives to run his academy in the 1960s, even as the opera culture is declining. Three young men, Sammo Hung, Jackie Chan and Yuen Biao, are determined to train under Master Yu and undergo extremely tough training before they become three of Hong Kong's biggest stars

programme.title: I Love Lolanto
programme.desc: Lolanto, a playboy, is injured and meets the daughter of a tycoon, Man, in the hospital. Man is mentally retarded and makes friends easily with Lolanto hence Man's father hires him to take care of her. However, as Man goes through treatments and recovers, her feelings for Lolanto also changes...

programme.title: All's Well End's Well (Extended Version)
programme.desc: In this beloved Hong Kong comedy, the three Chang brothers living with their parents learn that love blossoms with nurture, but withers when taken for granted through haste, deceit, and selfishness. This extended version features an additional shootout scene that was omitted from the original theatrical release during Lunar New Year 2016.

programme.title: Tristar
programme.desc: Young priest Hong disguises himself to protect Bai, a prostitute, while Detective Liu investigates her ties to a prostitution ring. Hong finds Bai a lawful job and helps her negotiate with the underworld. Meanwhile, Liu's investigation causes misunderstandings - can he crack down on the gang? How will Hong manage his emotions as Bai falls for him?

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 3
programme.desc: Gambling tycoon Man suddenly marries his new partner Sophie, which shocked his only son, Ken. In the wake of Man's heart attack, Ken must battle Sophie - who has persuaded Man to transfer his grand master title to her in the event of his death - for the rightful claim to the family's gambling business in a riveting game of mahjong.

programme.title: Justice, My Foot!
programme.desc: Stephen Chow plays Sung, a lawyer who uses any means necessary to help his wealthy clients escape the law. Sung retires to the countryside when urged by his wife, but when Mrs Sung encounters a woman whose husband's death has been covered up by corrupted officials, Sung returns to the court for justice to be served.

programme.title: Romantic Dream
programme.desc: Dino meets his dream girl Mandy and falls in love with her at first sight. However, she disappears suddenly and he only sees her again after nine years, when she is already married. To overcome the pain of losing his love, Dino finds a guru with supernatural power to make him meet Mandy in his dream.

programme.title: The Phantom Lover
programme.desc: In 1926 China, Sung, a talented singer, is deeply in love with To, a sweet innocent girl from a wealthy family. Their love evokes strong disapproval from To's father and bitter jealousy from her designated fiance, a young man chosen by her family. This is a story about a singer and a wealthy girl battling to be together in a traditional community.

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: Super Inframan
programme.desc: Transformed from a young laboratory researcher, the thunderbolt-fisted Inframan must battle Princess Dragon Mom who wakes up from hibernation to conquer the earth with her army of mutant monsters.

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: In 1973, the Hong Kong Heng Seng Index hit extraordinary peaks and people from all walks of life go stock market crazy. Meanwhile, Hong Kong's social problems build up without anyone paying attention to what are actually happening to the crazy lives of people, in this mad city that many call home...

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: Wu Song is appointed as chief constable after killing a tiger with his bare hands when drunk. The wife of his brother Wu Da Lang, seduces Wu Song but gets rejected by him, and engages in an affair with a rich man. They poison Wu Da Lang when he finds out about their affair. To avenge his brother's death, Wu Song kills both of them.

programme.title: The Secret Of The Dirk
programme.desc: The inhabitants of the City of Liu are forced to flee when the vicious Black Tigers gang raids their city, but are able to hide all their gold and treasures in a valley. A team of swordswomen led by Liu wants to get their hands on the treasures before the bandits, but both parties will have to contend with the wandering swordsman Chou for them...

programme.title: Return Of The Phoenix
programme.desc: An imperial minister Cheng betroths his pretty younger daughter, Ye, to his friend's son, Mu. His wife however, refuses to let Ye marry before her elder daughter Yan, who is ugly and undesirable. Yan is asked to pretend as Ye to meet Mu but scares him away. A rich guy who likes Ye meanwhile pretends as Mu to attend the wedding...

programme.title: Man Of Iron
programme.desc: A fearless fighter, Chou Lian Huan has risen to power in Shanghai with his exceptional combat skills. He risks his life for hostess Shen Ju Fang and embarks on a series of fierce battles against the son of a notorious triad leader and his gang, ultimately becoming a scapegoat in the gang's deadly turf war.

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Ah Chiao, a village girl stranded in the city, befriends a kind-hearted tramp and a retired actor. They are poor but happy, though Ah Chiao's fortune change for the better when she becomes a singer. However, she soon learns that money cannot buy one happiness...

programme.title: Heroes Shed No Tears
programme.desc: Kao Chien Fei is a young swordsman who wields a special sword with a teardrop marked on its blade. He is charged with averting an impending crisis in the martial arts world, but the villain, Zhou Tung Lai, wishes to become the ruler in the martial arts world, and launches a scheme to pit the various heroes against one another.

programme.title: The Pure And The Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fang's fiance and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him...

programme.title: The Tea House
programme.desc: Big Brother Cheng fled from the mainland to Hong Kong, where he opened a teahouse in a housing estate, hoping to find a peaceful life. However, relentless provocations from local triad gangs go unaddressed by the police, prompting Cheng and his friends at the teahouse to seek revenge.

programme.title: The Dancing Millionairess
programme.desc: Peter was a key dancer in a dance troupe and applied to be the chauffeur of a rich girl, Betty. When he is rumoured to be her lover, Betty is furious and goes undercover as a reporter to investigate the rumour. They fall in love in the process, and after putting Peter through many tests, they finally seal their love with a dance.

programme.title: The Fake Ghost Catchers
programme.desc: Huan Zhu's ghost seeks help from "Fake Ghost Catchers" Bao Tuo and Zhou Peng, after a jealous suitor's ghost seeks vengeance by murdering her and now targeting her sister. Together with actor Wu Shun Chao who possesses a supernatural talent, they unite to protect Huan Zhu's sister from both mortal and spectral threats.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxing
programme.desc: Chan and his apprentice Fan transport zombies for a living and are hired to move nine zombies in one go. When two hop away, it is revealed that one is actually a man in disguise trying to escape his enemies. It turns out that both the disguised zombie and Chan are martial arts experts!

programme.title: Call To Arms
programme.desc: The aggressive and dangerous Chin Empire conquers the hard-put Chao kingdom while the Wei empire is drained of its heroes and paralyzed by an indecisive ruler. Adventure, intrigue, death and tragedy reigns before the triumphant clash of the armies.

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: Ying Tai disguises herself as a boy to go to school and falls hopelessly in love with her classmate, Shan Bo. After Shan Bo realizes her true identity, he proposes marriage to Ying Tai. However, they are kept apart as she is engaged to another man. Knowing Shan Bo died in despair, Ying Tai is in deep sorrow and kills herself at his grave.

programme.title: Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A Wu Dang disciple Fu, kills the chief of Wu Dang Clan and frames it on the chief's illegitimate child, Yun. Fu then proclaims himself the new chief and orders the killing of Yun, who vows to avenge his father's death and learns the invincible silkworm martial arts style in order to defeat Fu.

programme.title: Between Tears And Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The General's henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: The Flying Guillotine
programme.desc: Ma Teng is an assassin of the 'Flying Guillotine Squad', a group of killers commissioned by the Emperor Yung. When Ma starts to question the morality of his missions, he finds himself becoming a fugitive hunted by his former comrades.

programme.title: Hex After Hex
programme.desc: Hell may have no fury like a woman scorned, but hell literally, really has no wrath like a lusting ghost scorned! Cult classic director Kuei Chih-hung shoots the works with this amazing horror romance starring muscular "Venom" Lo Meng.

programme.title: The Water Margin
programme.desc: This is a martial arts epic directed by Chang Cheh. In the Sung Dynasty, the government is run by corrupt officials, so Sung Jiang gathers 108 outlaws at Mount Liang and establishes a band of patriotic heroes to end the repression of brutal overlords.

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu takes on the glitzy world of nightclub performers in The Yellow Muffler. The film depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching-ping (Irene Chen I-ling) and Pai-hung (Betty Ting Pei) and ends when they are cast in a new movie.

programme.title: The Swordmates
programme.desc: Li asks his swordmate Wang to protect his family while he is away, but Wang rapes his wife and even has his convoy attacked. Li escaped but fears his daughter is still in danger, so he asks the nephew of his master to help protect her...

programme.title: The Venus' Tear Diamond
programme.desc: Legendary rival jewel thieves Fragrant Night and Nocturnal Earl travel to Japan to steal the famous Venus' Tear Diamond. They fall quickly in love at first sight, without knowing the other person is their rival and is after the same prize. Who will get the diamond, and will it mean the end of their new found love?

programme.title: Marco Polo
programme.desc: Mongolian emperor Kublai Khan is being assassinated while meeting with the Italian explorer Marco Polo. Marco Polo is appointed to lead the troops for the emperor to wipe out the anti-Mongol rebels. Yet, he is touched by these rebels who are resisting the Mongolian invasion of their homeland. Will Marco Polo stay loyal to the emperor?

programme.title: Family Light Affair
programme.desc: Alfred Cheung Kin-ting returns to the screen with this seriocomic look at the clash of cultures which result when a Mainland Chinese peasant brings his family to Hong Kong. Family Light Affair, whose Chinese title literally translates as "City Lights", is the director/writer's warm-hearted memoir of street life back in the early 1980s, featuring an eclectic cast of pop music and kung fu stars who shine in their poignant roles.

programme.title: The Supreme Swordsman
programme.desc: After beating several famous swordsmen, Chin Wu Hsin of the Mo Shan clan challenges Supreme Swordsman to a duel, hoping to win his title, and is beaten and humiliated. The winner taunts him to find a Supreme Sword made by Old Eagle, a famous sword-maker. When his offer to buy a sword from Old Eagle, is turned down, he challenges Old Eagle to a duel, and snatches his sword in a foul play. Old Eagle's own son Shih Yen-peh vows to avenge for his father...

programme.title: Hex Vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler with bad luck owes money to a violent gangster boss and trades his wife as down payment, causing her to leave him. As he decides to kill himself, a mysterious old man offers him a proposal to marry the ghost of his dead daughter in exchange for cash and an expensive apartment.

programme.title: Shao Kang's War Room
programme.desc: Shao Kang's War Room is a Talkshow hosted by Zhao Shao Kang. This programme combines TVBS News source and Mr. Zhao's rich political and media background, to analyse important news deeply.

programme.title: Global Golden Line
programme.desc: It is the first professional reality car show, providing concrete evaluations of cars on the market, the deepest appreciation for classic cars, the hottest trends in the motoring world, and analysis of the latest auto tech trends.

programme.title: Chop Chop Show
programme.desc: The show invites younger generations to talk about relationship, career, entertainment, current affairs, and all the other popular topics that they care and complain about.

programme.title: Citizens' Subjects
programme.desc: Citizens' Subjects utilizes the perspective of Taiwan people and Taiwan events to tell the stories of Taiwan. It takes a light-hearted, humorous approach to interpreting current affairs.

programme.title: Queen
programme.desc: From makeup, skincare, hairstyle, clothing, horoscopes, parenting, to travel, all kinds of fashion-related topics are presented in the program. Pauline Lan leads dozens of professionals and experts across categories to offer the best fashion insights and tips.

programme.title: Global Focus
programme.desc: Bringing you the latest political, economy, information technology and breaking news around the world.

programme.title: All About Health
programme.desc: How well do you know your body? What should you eat to be healthy and energetic? Are health tips available online reliable? Tune in to this programme as the hosts give you all the answers!

programme.desc: A news programme that provides the latest international and Taiwan news, as well as in-depth analyses of important issues around the world.

programme.title: All About Health
programme.desc: How well do you know your body? What should you eat to be healthy and energetic? Are health tips available online reliable? Tune in to this programme as the hosts give you all the answers!

programme.title: Battle ATM
programme.desc: Creating a brand-new interactive ATM that combined with puzzle solving and daily life! Guests can win money by taking three rounds of intellectual challenges from the ATM, turn wisdom into money! Futuristic program scenes with video game clearing concept, where challengers engage in the intellectual competition to switch on the ATM. Those who won goes to the ultimate challenge.

programme.title: i Walker
programme.desc: Eight i Walkers take you around the world in a fun-filled adventure.

programme.title: Discover New Taiwan Step By Step
programme.desc: The creative production team goes around Taiwan in search of inspiring stories in the country. Get to know more unique individuals and discover the true spirit of Taiwan.

programme.title: A Date with The Future - EP 14
programme.desc: From a rescue operation ten years ago to their encounter ten years later, firefighter Jin Shi Chuan (William Chan) and Xu Lai (Zhang Ruo Nan), who's now a journalist and a dog trainer, become partners.

programme.title: Divas Hit the Road 7 - EP 9
programme.desc: Join Na Ying and a lively team of seven as they dive into a 25 day Silk Road trip filled with cultural encounters, heartfelt moments, and self-discovery, bringing Chinese culture to life on a global stage.

programme.title: Love Endures - EP 17
programme.desc: The story revolves around seven lifelong companions who reside in the same area, relying on and supporting each other through their toughest times. They undergo separation and reunite years later.

programme.title: Ride the Wind 2023 - EP 12
programme.desc: Experience the strength of international female solidarity as talented performers from diverse industries unite to showcase the beauty of Chinese culture and surpass their own limits in the highly anticipated season of Sisters.

programme.title: A Date with The Future - EP 15
programme.desc: From a rescue operation ten years ago to their encounter ten years later, firefighter Jin Shi Chuan (William Chan) and Xu Lai (Zhang Ruo Nan), who's now a journalist and a dog trainer, become partners.

programme.title: Perfect Match 11 - EP 35
programme.desc: Perfect Match is a highly-rated large-scale dating variety show that connects eligible bachelors to bachelorettes in China. Be thoroughly entertained by the sharp and witty Meng Fei, one of the top hosts for shows of this genre, as he presents a unique and humorous approach to interactions between all the participants.

programme.title: Billionaire Story - EP 327
programme.desc: A street separates two worlds. On one side, there is a hard-working life in the market with both hardships and laughter; one the other, it's the life of rich and wealthy families who are intriguing and trembling.

programme.title: Divas Hit the Road 7 - EP 9
programme.desc: Join Na Ying and a lively team of seven as they dive into a 25 day Silk Road trip filled with cultural encounters, heartfelt moments, and self-discovery, bringing Chinese culture to life on a global stage.

programme.title: Oh! My Queen - EP 89
programme.desc: Embark on a regal journey with "Oh! My Queen" to craft a refreshingly down-to-earth entertainment experience! Delving into topics that resonate with everyone, each episode unfolds with lively discussions, injecting humor and joy into our daily lives, your go-to remedy for stress and a guaranteed laughter-inducing escape!

programme.title: The Queen of News - EP 22
programme.desc: This fast-paced newsroom drama tells the story of SKN News' two prime-time anchors Sis Man and George facing off at every turn. The up-and-coming anchors are naturally embroiled into the tricky dynamics!

programme.title: Perfect Match 11 - EP 35
programme.desc: Perfect Match is a highly-rated large-scale dating variety show that connects eligible bachelors to bachelorettes in China. Be thoroughly entertained by the sharp and witty Meng Fei, one of the top hosts for shows of this genre, as he presents a unique and humorous approach to interactions between all the participants.

programme.title: Genius Go Go Go - EP 193
programme.desc: This large-scale variety show gathers showbiz entertainers to challenge each other in various hilarious educational games. Viewers at home are also encouraged to get in on the fun and try out the games with friends in real life!

programme.title: The Queen of News - EP 23
programme.desc: This fast-paced newsroom drama tells the story of SKN News' two prime-time anchors Sis Man and George facing off at every turn. The up-and-coming anchors are naturally embroiled into the tricky dynamics!

programme.title: Billionaire Story - EP 328
programme.desc: A street separates two worlds. On one side, there is a hard-working life in the market with both hardships and laughter; one the other, it's the life of rich and wealthy families who are intriguing and trembling.

programme.title: World's No. 1: Philippines - EP 1
programme.desc: Dive into The World's No.1: Philippines, an exhilarating journey through a nation bursting with color, flavor, and life! From bustling street markets and fiery kitchens to hidden natural wonders and heartwarming local stories, every stop unveils the true spirit and irresistible charm of the Philippines.

programme.title: Mr Player - EP 68

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 757
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: My Perfect Stranger - EP 6
programme.desc: The story depicts a strange and beautiful story of time travel between Yoon Hae Jun (Kim Dong Wook) who seeks the truth behind a murder case, and Baek Yoon Young (Jin Ki Joo) who wants to prevent the marriage of her parents while getting trapped in year 1987.

programme.title: The Litchi Road - EP 30
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Adapted from the same-name novel, the drama features a minor official, Li Shande (Lei Jia Yin), during the Tang Dynasty. He overcomes numerous hardships and travels thousands of miles to deliver lychees from Gaozhou in Lingnan to Chang’an.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2085
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 12
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Auyeung Kwan interferes with Chow Chun-kit investigating Au Ming-wai. Chow Chun-kit is inspired by Ho Tin-yu, so he starts investigating with some witness introduced by Au Ming-wai, whose alibi is overturned. The duo are arrested. During the investigation, Chow Chun-kit believes he and Bong are monitored by the mole, and it’s something involved in the conspiracy of the entire police force.

programme.title: The Wanted Detective - EP 19
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] On his wedding day, Xiao Bei Ming (Wang Xing Yue), the best detective of Qi, was framed as a demon and fled into the lake on the charge of murdering his master and treason. Three years later, he returned and joins a group of witty partners to seek justice.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2085
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne (with Eng Subs) - EP 17
programme.desc: Chi-bun is worried about Chi-lam exposing the family scandal. He lectures Chi-lam, who is annoyed. Chi-lam tells him they are not Sau-yi’s children. To declare he is the only successor, Chi-bun brings forward the Hon-yeung bronze statue unveiling ceremony. But he has not informed Ho-yee. Chi-lam unwittingly finds out Ko Sing was the youth club badminton team captain.
